Compute extinction risk score from extrisk_code and flags

Source: R/listings.R
compute_er_score.Rd

US-listed species get a base score from ESA status plus additive bonuses for MMPA (+20) and MBTA (+10), capped at 100. Non-US species fall back to IUCN Red List scale (CR=50, EN=25, VU=5, NT=2, other=1).

Usage

compute_er_score(extrisk_code, is_mmpa = FALSE, is_mbta = FALSE)

Arguments

extrisk_code

character, e.g. "NMFS:EN", "FWS:TN", "IUCN:CR"

is_mmpa

logical; species protected under MMPA (default: FALSE)

is_mbta

logical; species protected under MBTA (default: FALSE)

Value

integer score 0-100
